## Data

```{r}
library(car)

```

## Training and test set

```{r}
df <- Prestige %>% mutate(id = row_number())
## set the seed to make your partition reproducible
set.seed(123)
train <- df %>% sample_frac(.80)
dim(train)
head(train)
test <- anti_join(df, train, by = 'id')
dim(test)
```
